CutSceneText.Text: A strong Balaur bulwark blocks the way to Tiamaranta.
So I was looking for a way to detour the bulwark
and found a secret passage called the Silentera Canyon.
I also found out that it is connected all the way to Gelkmaros where Asmodians advanced.
The Silentera Canyon opens only when the two Balaur temples
in Angrief Crater and Hanarkand Plain are captured.
If we go to Gelkmaros through the passage and suppress Asmodians,
we will deal with Tiamat more easily.
might capture the Balaur fortress in Inggison. So we've got to be careful.
Of course, Agent Herenas will do something when that happens.
